message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good deal considering inflation!
You're being greedy! I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than that.  Let's split it 60/40. It's a fair deal considering the inflation we're facing.
You're getting desperate, I can see that. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the last offer I'll make!
